Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

ManagedBy.description: An array of links to the managers responsible for managing this power equipment.
ManagedBy.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Manager that represent the managers that manage this power equipment.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerEquipment.description: This is the schema definition for the set of power equipment.
PowerEquipment.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the set of power equipment for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ElectricalBuses.description: The link to a collection of electrical buses.
ElectricalBuses.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type PowerDistributionCollection that contains a set of electrical bus units.

FloorPDUs.description: A link to a collection of floor power distribution units.
FloorPDUs.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type PowerDistributionCollection that contains a set of floor power distribution units.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by or subordinate to this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PowerShelves.description: A link to a collection of power shelves.
PowerShelves.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type PowerDistributionCollection that contains a set of power shelves.

RackPDUs.description: A link to a collection of rack-level power distribution units.
RackPDUs.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type PowerDistributionCollection that contains a set of rack-level power distribution units.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Switchgear.description: A link to a collection of switchgear.
Switchgear.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type PowerDistributionCollection that contains a set of switchgear.

TransferSwitches.description: A link to a collection of transfer switches.
TransferSwitches.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type PowerDistributionCollection that contains a set of transfer switches.
